definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Should more scientific writing and studies be in the French language?
sentences.chinese: 是否應當更多地以法語進行科學著述和研究呢？

sentences.english: For scientists in academia, publications are the lifeblood of their careers.
sentences.chinese: 對學術界的科學家來說，著述是他們的生命。

sentences.english: Owing to a lot of reasons, his many works were not printed and handed down.
sentences.chinese: 由於種種原因，他的許多著述未能刊刻流傳。

sentences.english: Much has been written about innovative companies and what sets them apart.
sentences.chinese: 關於創新公司及它們之間的區別已經有很多著述。

sentences.english: And they may excerpt others’ work for the purpose of commentary and criticism.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能出於評論和批評需要而摘錄別人的著述。

sentences.english: Linzhi Bachelor was the official position set up by Emperor Ming in Northern Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 麟趾學士是北周明帝設置的文化著述職官。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution of Sichuan works on Confucian classics in Qing Dynasty was not balance.
sentences.chinese: 清代四川經學著述的地域分佈呈現出不平衡的局面。

sentences.english: The author acclaims Liu's Styles and Construction of Chinese Architecture and shows the a deep reverence for Mr.
sentences.chinese: 對於劉先生的《中國建築類型與結構》著述推崇備至。

sentences.english: A brief account of Liu Zihui's life story and writings.
sentences.chinese: 簡述劉子翠的生平與著述。

sentences.english: The views and writings of the masters in Zhou and Qin Dynasties contain profound insights on history.
sentences.chinese: 周秦諸子的言論與著述，蘊涵對於歷史的深刻認識。

sentences.english: This article, by means of the annals of Xia Jingguan's works, sorts out his academic achievements preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 本文對夏敬觀著述進行編年，初步清理其學術成果。

sentences.english: Thus, although Coase's writings was not a rich, but the merit of Qi-wei.
sentences.chinese: 由此看來，雖然科斯著述不豐，但功績其偉。

sentences.english: In his life he wrote a lot of works, especially the historical works.
sentences.chinese: 他一生著述如林，而尤以史學著述爲多。

sentences.english: In his life he wrote a lot of works, especially the historical works.
sentences.chinese: 他一生著述如林，而尤以史學著述爲多。

sentences.english: There were numerous schools and masters as well as works, being of great variety and achievement.
sentences.chinese: 清代荀學學派林立，大師輩出，著述繁富，成就斐然。

sentences.english: Apostolic authorship was one thing they talk about.
sentences.chinese: 使徒著述纔是他們的考慮標準。

definition: to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
